welcome_message_body: Welcome to Liverpool, a city known for its rich musical heritage, stunning waterfront, and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy exploring our charming city and all it has to offer!

restaurants.name: Fazenda Rodizio
restaurants.description: Fazenda Rodizio is a brazilian restaurant located in Liverpool.
restaurants.address: Unit B, Horton House, Exchange Flags (Chapel St), Liverpool, L2 3YL

restaurants.name: Bacaro
restaurants.description: Bacaro is a italian restaurant located in Liverpool.

restaurants.name: Pret a Manger
restaurants.description: Pret a Manger is a sandwich spot located in Liverpool.
restaurants.address: 3 Derby Square Liverpool (Lord St), Liverpool, L2 9UJ

restaurants.name: Hawksmoor Liverpool
restaurants.description: Hawksmoor Liverpool is a steakhouse located in Liverpool.

restaurants.name: Rococo Coffee House
restaurants.description: Rococo Coffee House is a café located in Liverpool.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chester Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Chester Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Manchester Airport, serving a variety of domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern and spacious terminal at Manchester Airport, primarily serving European and long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller and more compact terminal at Manchester Airport, mainly used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for faster speeds.
